alert.note: Alert for Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 9:44PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Moderate to Heavy Snow Showers will impact portions of Bayfield and east central Douglas Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 942 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of moderate to heavy snow showers along a line extending from 9 miles west of Barksdale, to near Brule, to near Barnes, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Visibility less than 1/2 mile, rapid snow accumulation of up to 1/4 inch on roads, and winds gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Roads may become snow or ice covered and slippery. Snow Showers will be near... Ashland, Washburn, Barksdale, Town of Delta and Ino around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these snow showers include Moquah, Upper Eau Claire Lake, Blueberry, Waino, Middle Eau Claire Lake and Bad River Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Use extra caution if you must travel into or through these snow showers. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents.
